divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking my before bed cig it was about 11:05 pm as usual i was staring off into space literally looking at orions belt when i noticed 2 very fast moving objects all black with no lights and no noise travel in a straight path above me half way through this sighting they crossed eachothers paths and switched back yet again all while maintaining the same distance from one another . i remember thinking to myself that what i was watching couldnt be from earth or man made for a few reasons 1) ive never watched any flying object move so quickly literally from start(when i noticed them) to when they were out of view was a mere 2 to 3 seconds and they covered the entire sky 2)most fighter jets ive seen around here even at night have some visible lighting these objects were completely dark (blacker than the sky 3)no noise . i live in albuquerque nm kirtland airforce base is maybe 10 miles away and even f22 raptors move fast and most times you cant hear them till they have passed you these 2 objects made no noise even once they had moved past me . i remember thinking to myself as i was watching them "that i dont think these are from here" and also having a very unsettleing feeling my hair stood up on end . i guess i wont really ever know what i saw but im certain that in all the universe and the stars that are beyond our sight we can not be the only inteligent life forms in exsistance
Summary: extremely fast moving black no noise
